```{r setup}
setwd("~/Downloads/kokako-viral-family-estimates-master")
data <- read.csv("./normalisedpiechart.csv")
  
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
  
k1 <- slice(data, 3)[,2:37]
k1_zero <- k1[, colSums(k1 != 0) > 0]
k1_matrix_transposed <- as.data.frame(t(k1_zero))
headers <- names(k1_zero)
  
k1_d <- as.list(t(k1_zero))
  
k1_data <- data.frame("Family"=headers, "value"=t(k1_zero))
```

```{r pie}
  
ggplot(k1_data, aes(x="", y=value, fill=Family)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity", width=1, color="white") +
  coord_polar("y", start=0) +
  theme_void()
```
